item.description:
I ran across this paper by R. Lanza A New Theory of the Universe (obviously I was drawn by the modest title) which makes an interesting and surely controversial case for biocentrism as a foundation for fundamental theory. So let's see if we can make sense of it, trash it, or a linear superposition of both...

See ya there
Sean

group.name: The Boston Philosophy of Mind Group

item.name: Discussion of paper: "New Theory of the Universe"
